scripts.start: concurrently -n "client,server" "cd client && PORT=8022 yarn start" "cd server && yarn start"
scripts.build: yarn clean:dist && yarn build:client && yarn build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && yarn build && cp -r build ../dist/public
scripts.build:server: cd server && yarn build && cp -r build ../dist/src && cp -r node_modules ../dist/node_modules
